name: GBIsland
description:
You find yourself stranded on a deserted island. Cliché? Maybe, but what the heck - go along with it and find out if you'll be able to escape!

Come again? That's your wish come true?! ... We'll that's fine too! Play and enjoy the leisure of having to do absolutely nothing aside from eating and sleeping.

Don't be afraid to experiment, some inventions may come quite unexpected!

Every item has it's purpose.

Tip: Use + and - keys to scale the game window.

PS: This game is my first ever jam entry! Feel free to share your opinion in the comments.
